EmailTemplate.description: Color Curb application submitted + directions of how to pay
EmailTemplate.name: Color Curbs Submission
EmailTemplate.subject: Thank you for submitting a Color Curb request
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {!Contact.FirstName},
Thank you for submitting a Color Curb request. We will be processing your request Case Number ({!Case.CaseNumber}). If your application requires payment, we will not be processing your request until payment has been received. Please use the link below to access your case and click the Visa button to proceed with payment with credit card or please write and send a check payable to the SFMTA.
{!Case.Link}
Thank you, San Francisco Municipal Transportation Agency
